io.github.trulyfree.modular.action

Interface ActionGroup<T extends Action>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of Action supported by this ActionGroup.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActionHandler<T>, ModifiableActionGroup<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BackgroundPrioritizedActionHandler, GeneralizedActionHandler, PrioritizedActionHandler

    public interface ActionGroup<T extends Action>
    ActionGroup interface. All events which are related in some way should be packaged in an ActionGroup. Depending on the usage of EventHandlers, it may be efficient to use an implementation which also implements "Action", by which the "enact" method loops throughout the events contained within this event group and enacts them all.
    Author:
    vtcakavsmoace

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void enactAll() 
      default void enactAllOfType(Class<? extends T> type) 
      boolean enactNextEvent()
      Method to be called in order to enact the next Action contained by this ActionGroup.
      Collection<T> getActions()
      Method to be called in order to retrieve the events held by this ActionGroup, including those already enacted.
      int size()
      Method to be called in order to check the number of events held by this ActionGroup in total, including those already enacted.

    • Method Detail

      • enactNextEvent

        boolean enactNextEvent()
        Method to be called in order to enact the next Action contained by this ActionGroup. This method should be preferred over iterating through the children and executing them individually in an external class.
        Returns:
        success A boolean representing the success of the event enacted.

      • size

        int size()
        Method to be called in order to check the number of events held by this ActionGroup in total, including those already enacted.
        Returns:
        size The number of events held by this ActionGroup.

      • getActions

        Collection<T> getActions()
        Method to be called in order to retrieve the events held by this ActionGroup, including those already enacted. The collection returned should NOT be capable of modifying the ActionGroup's internal Action collection. If the ActionGroup is intended to be modifiable, the user should implement the ModifiableActionGroup interface.
        Returns:
        events The events of this ActionGroup. Note that modifications to this collection should NOT modify the events of the ActionGroup.

      • enactAllOfType

        default void enactAllOfType(Class<? extends T> type)

      • enactAll

        default void enactAll()
